name: MoodleSolver
description: Assists in solving Moodle-based assessments with stealth scraping, text+vision AI, and detailed logging.

get_all_data.description: Scrape all quiz questions & run AI processing (stealth if enabled).

answer_current_question.description: Select the AI‑calculated answer for the current question page.

answer_all_questions.description: Ensure all questions are scraped & processed by AI (no clicks).

clear_stored_data.description: Clear all stored quiz data and AI answers.

rescan_current_page.description: Re‑scrape only the current question page and refresh cache.

toggle_debug_overlay.description: Toggle the on‑screen debug log overlay.

stealth_show_answer.description: Show the AI‑chosen answer letter in the external dropdown (no click).
